title: Top 10 Chinese companies in operating revenue in 2019
text:
The China Entrepreneur Association published the latest top 500 Chinese companies in annual operating revenue recently.

Chinese enterprises within the 2019 top 500 list kept a growing momentum. Statistics show the total operating revenue of the top 500 reached 79.1 trillion yuan ($11.04 trillion), up 11.14 percent from a year earlier, and their total assets reached 299.15 trillion yuan, rising by 9.08 percent compared to that of the top 500 last year.

Among the 2019 top 500, 194 enterprises saw their operating revenue exceed 100 billion yuan. And the revenue of six enterprises crossed the 1 trillion yuan threshold.

The top 500 enterprises realized total profits of 4.49 trillion yuan in 2019, up 20.7 percent over the top 500 last year.

Now, let's have a look at the top 10 Chinese companies.
description: The China Entrepreneur Association published the latest top 500 Chinese companies in annual operating revenue on Sunday.
